I went to this salon for the first time and got to meet the amazing Nazia who did my hair like no other! I took her deal for balayage and was completely satisfied with the results. She and her team are extremely sweet, cooperative and polite. I would highly recommend her for any of your hair transformations. Thank you Nazia! You’re a gem.

Great place and service!! I couldn’t imagine anyone else colouring and cutting my hair as well as she does! All the great techniques, amazing knowledge and awesome service. I’ll recommend Nazia to everyone who want to have perfect hair colour and style. Thankyou Nazia and I’m looking forward to my next visit in December InshaAllah
